name: Rocket Propulsion
description: Study the basics of rocket propulsion, covering propulsion theory, engine types, fuel chemistry, and practical applications. Includes both theoretical learning and lab work.

name: Aerodynamics
description: Explore aerodynamic principles, including airflow, lift and drag, and airfoil design, with a mix of theoretical and practical applications in aircraft design.

name: Spacecraft Design
description: Learn about spacecraft systems, propulsion, and payload integration, with emphasis on design and problem-solving for careers in the space industry.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: Covers structure, properties, and reactions of organic compounds, with topics including hydrocarbons, stereochemistry, and organic synthesis.

name: Inorganic Chemistry
description: Focuses on inorganic and organometallic compounds, covering coordination chemistry, bonding theories, and synthesis techniques.

name: Physical Chemistry
description: Combines physics and chemistry to explore thermodynamics, kinetics, and quantum mechanics, with hands-on labs for data analysis and research skills.

name: Ancient Languages and Scripts of Middle-earth
description: Study Elvish, Dwarvish, and other languages of Middle-earth, including their linguistic structures and cultural significance.
author: 654f9ec2ea7ead465908d1e3

name: Wizards, Elves, and Men: Inter-species Diplomacy in Middle-earth
description: Explore the relationships and diplomacy among Middle-earth’s races, focusing on alliances, conflicts, and key historical events.
author: 654f9ec2ea7ead465908d1e3

name: History and Practice of Middle-earth Magic
description: Delve into the sources and ethics of magic in Middle-earth, covering key beings and magical artifacts like the Rings of Power.
author: 654f9ec2ea7ead465908d1e3

name: Principles of Democratic Education
description: Examines democratic education, focusing on civic responsibility, critical thinking, and participatory learning models.

name: Philosophy of Independence and Liberation
description: Study ideologies of independence in Latin American history, focusing on figures like Simón Bolívar and Enlightenment influences.

name: Innovations in Early 19th Century Education
description: Focuses on educational reform in the 19th century, exploring the work of pioneers like Simon Rodríguez and their impact on modern pedagogy.

name: Foundations of Christian Ethics
description: Explore core principles of Christian ethics, covering moral decision-making, virtues, and contemporary issues in ethical living.
author: 65500111ea7ead465908d1fa

name: Early Christianity and the Apostolic Age
description: Study the early Christian communities and the Apostolic Age, focusing on the spread of Christianity and its doctrines.
author: 65500111ea7ead465908d1fa

name: Leadership and Service in Christian Communities
description: Covers leadership and service within Christian communities, including pastoral care, community building, and servant leadership.
author: 65500111ea7ead465908d1fa

name: Sufi Philosophy and Mystical Traditions
description: Explore the philosophy and practices of Sufism, including teachings on love, divine union, and the soul’s journey.
author: 655000a4ea7ead465908d1f5

name: Ethical Wisdom in Islamic Teachings
description: Examines Islamic moral teachings, focusing on concepts of guidance, free will, and righteousness.
author: 655000a4ea7ead465908d1f5

name: Understanding the Unseen: Islamic Esotericism
description: Study the unseen spiritual world in Islam, focusing on mystical experiences, symbols, and teachings.
author: 655000a4ea7ead465908d1f5

name: Ancient Chinese Environmental Management
description: Explore ancient Chinese environmental management practices, focusing on water management, agriculture, and philosophy.

name: Leadership Lessons from Chinese Mythology
description: Examines leadership qualities in Chinese mythology, focusing on figures like Yu the Great and their impact on cultural identity.

name: Hydraulic Engineering in Ancient Civilizations
description: Study ancient hydraulic engineering, including flood control and irrigation, with comparisons across ancient civilizations.
